msbt.message: Um Weren't we getting together at your place, ?I looked all over for you, but you didn't seem to be around, so I just sort of gave up on our plans I'm sad this didn't work out, but I'd still love to try again sometime.
!I know we said I'd visit you at home today, but something's come up.Even though I can't make it this time, I appreciate the invitation. Maybe we can try again some other time?
, I'm so sorry! I know we said we'd meet at your place, but something came up I hope this doesn't keep you from inviting me over again sometime. I really would love to come over.
